6.2.2 Save Page As

Saves the content of the currently visible page to a file. This can either be an image (pages Ecological Simulation and Simplex Diagram) or plain ASCII text (pages Tournament and User Defined Strategies). Currently the only supported file format for graphical images is the png format.


Eckhart Arnold 2006-10-14
